name: Block Tech: Epic Sandbox
description:
Block Tech : Epic Sandbox Car Craft Simulator

Build an unbreakable car. In the game, you can show your skills in building incredible vehicles, for this you have access to more blocks, such as wheels of different types and purposes, turrets, machine guns, rocket launchers, rocket engines, and armor. Fight with opponents on terra tech and win, victory will not be easy. The game has two types of events, the first is the derby and in this battle, every man for himself, the opponents will increase their weapon power and speed, so do not lag behind. In the second event, you will find a huge number of tests, here you need to be smart to craft a suitable vehicle for passing.

Tips:
- Do not forget to pick up rewards every day.
- Do not forget to look at the panel of the characteristics of your vehicle.
- Weight affects the speed of movement, do not forget about lightweight blocks, for super fast wheelbarrows.
- The overall strength depends on the strength of each unit, but do not forget to protect the cabin well.
- Power depends on the type of wheels installed, more power is needed. Put more wheels.
- Firepower displays the amount of damage done per second, do not forget that larger guns require more energy.
- Energy, everything is simple, the more, the longer you can shoot, the higher you go, the faster you go, but do not forget that the battery weighs a lot.
- In order not to disassemble your favorite car, save it in the garage in one of the slots, and load it when you need it.
- Rocket boosters can be used both for acceleration and for flight.
- Manage installed cannons, during the battle, you can turn off the voracious cannons to save energy.
- Beat the enemy wheels and he will be defenseless.
- In test mode, you can dig up money for the purchase of new units.
- Use the grenade launcher on slow opponents.
- For a beaten record, you will also receive a reward.

Have a nice game.
Share the game with friends.
